p.k: Perish the thought of us falling into an angelical rehabiliatation of such a contestable and impugned dictator. It seemed impossible for us to deny the blood staining Bokassa's hands. But we have not produced an other audiovisual pamphlet. Our goal was to unveil the dictator's dark side and to reveal an astonishing face of the tyrant: sometimes generous and human, ofter hot-tempered and cruel, a ridiculous and whimsical megalomaniac indeed.
